LDD

Contains logic for the LDD and OCT components.

Functions
Select
call LDD.Select();

Select the LDD system

SelectOffset
call LDD.SelectOffset();

Activate the LDD component and tool offsets

Deselect
call LDD.Deselect();

Stop any executing jobs, and deactivate the LDD offsets

GetSystemState
call LDD.GetSystemState(
&state
);

Request the status of the LDD system

Response Parameters
&state

the LDD System State

EnterRemoteMode
call LDD.EnterRemoteMode();

Instruct the LDD to enter remote mode

ExitRemoteMode
call LDD.ExitRemoteMode();

Instruct the LDD to leave remote mode

StartJobByIndex
call LDD.StartJobByIndex(
jobIndex
);

Instruct the LDD to start the job at the specified index

Parameters
jobIndex

the index of the job to start

StartJobByName
call LDD.StartJobByName(
jobName
);

Instruct the LDD to start the job with the specified name

Parameters
jobName

the name of the job to start

StopJob
call LDD.StopJob();

Instruct the LDD to stop the current job

GetRemoteModeState
call LDD.GetRemoteModeState(
&state
);

Query the current remote mode setting of the LDD

Response Parameters
&state

if the LDD system is in remote mode, TRUE.  Otherwise, FALSE.

Restart_Ldd_Pc
call LDD.Restart_Ldd_Pc();

Shut down and restart the separate PC that runs the LDD system

Shutdown_Ldd_Pc
call LDD.Shutdown_Ldd_Pc();

Shut down the separate PC that runs the LDD system

Trigger
call LDD.Trigger();

Trigger the LDD to run a job
